casebody.data:
Caron Associates, Inc.
v.
Southside Manufacturing Corp. and Crown Financial, LLC No. 296P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Ronald H. Garber, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Crown Financial, LLC. Philip T. Gray, Attorney at Law, Cary, for Caron Associates, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of August 2016 by Defendant (Crown Financial, LLC) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
